info.description:
This API will return POS Daily Sales data from Aramark's Enterprise POS

__The base endpoint URL for this API in production is:__ `https://marko.aramark.net/v1/pos/transactions`.
info.title: POS Transactions

tags.name: Service Charges
tags.description: Get POS Transaction Service Charge Data

get.summary: Returns POS Transaction Check Data for a Date Range by POS System

200.description: Provides the Transaction Check data by POS System

get.summary: Returns POS Transaction Item Data for a Date Range by POS System

200.description: Provides the Transaction Item data by POS System

get.summary: Returns POS Transaction Tender Data for a Date Range by POS System

200.description: Provides the Transaction Tender data by POS System

get.summary: Returns POS Transaction Discount Data for a Date Range by POS System

200.description: Provides the Transaction Discount data by POS System

get.summary: Returns POS Transaction Service Charge Data for a Date Range by POS System

200.description: Provides the Transaction Service Charge data by POS System

sourceSystemParam.name: source_system
sourceSystemParam.description:
Name of the POS System:
 * `MASH` - Mashgin, `SMCS` - S&E Micros, `EMCS` - Enterprise Micros

startDateTimeParam.name: start_date_time
startDateTimeParam.description: Calendar start date and time for transactions. "MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm". Must be within 24 hours of end_date_time.

endDateTimeParam.name: end_date_time
endDateTimeParam.description: Calendar end date and time for transactions. "MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm". Must be within 24 hours of start_date_time.

pageParam.name: page
pageParam.description: Page number of result set. Default 1

sizeParam.name: size
sizeParam.description: Number of rows in each page to return. Default 50

rawParam.name: raw
rawParam.description: Flag used to determine if the data is direct from the source system, unconformed or not

bypassCacheParam.name: bypass-cache
bypassCacheParam.description: This HTTP Header variable will bypass cache.

smokeParam.name: smoke
smokeParam.description: When set to 'true' this HTTP header variable will route the API call to the Integration testing environment.  Only applicable in QA.

apiKey.name: apikey
apiKey.description: This HTTP Header variable will verify permissions.

source_system.description: Identifier of the source POS system
Identifier of the source POS system
Identifier of the source POS system
Identifier of the source POS system
Identifier of the source POS system

check_date_time.description: Date and time of the transaction (UTC)

check_local_date_time.description: Date and time of the transaction in local timezone

device_id.description: System identifier for the POS device

master_store_id.description: The ID of the master store

check_subtotal.description: Total value of the Check Items before tax

check_tax.description: Total amount of tax for the Order

discount_total.description: Total amount discounted from the Order

check_total.description: Sum total of the Check, including tax

number_of_items.description: Number of items in the Check

time_to_ready.description: Time until transaction was ready to accept payment (seconds)

time_to_pay.description: Time from ready until payment data received (seconds)

time_to_process.description: Time to receive a response from payment processor (seconds)

time_to_leave.description: Time from completed payment to customer leaving (seconds)

last_update_date.description: Date and time the Check data was updated

check_open_local_date_time.description: Date and time of the transaction in local timezone

store_id.description: System identifer for the Store (Revenue Center ID)

store_name.description: Name of the Store (Revenue Center Name)

master_store_id.description: The ID of the master store

check_subtotal.description: Total value of the Check Items before tax

check_tax.description: Total amount of tax for the Check

discount_total.description: Total amount discounted from the Order

check_total.description: Sum total of the check including Tax

check_number.description: The check number from the system

num_guests.description: The number of guests on the check

check_close_date_time.description: Date and time the check was closed (blank if open at EOD)

xfer_to_check_number.description: The check number this check was transferred to

check_open_business_date.description: The business date the check was opened

check_close_business_date.description: The business date the check was closed

last_update_date.description: Date and time the Check data was updated

check_open_local_date_time.description: Local date-time when the Check was opened

check_close_local_date_time.description: Local date-time when the Check was closed

revenue_center_id.description: System identifier for the Revenue Center/Store

discount_total.description: Total Discount amount for the Check

check_total.description: Final total amount for the Check

tax_exempt_total.description: Total tax exempt amount for the Check

void_total.description: Total void amount for the Check

tip_total.description: Total tip amount for the Check

manager_void_total.description: Total manager void amount for the Check

return_total.description: Total return amount for the Check

error_correct_total.description: Total error correct amount for the Check

service_charge_total.description: Total service charge amount for the Check

svc_charge_exempt_total.description: Total service charge exempt amount for the Check

other_total.description: Total other amount for the Check

number_of_items.description: Number of items for the Check

check_date_time.description: Date and time of the transaction (UTC)

check_local_date_time.description: Date and time of the transaction in local timezone

device_id.description: System identifier for the POS device

master_store_id.description: The ID of the master store

item_id.description: Unique identifier for the Item.  System generated

item_count.description: Number of the Item for the Check

item_price.description: Price of the Item before tax

item_price_by_weight.description: Price of the Item by weight

item_after_tax_price.description: Price of the Item after tax

reco_method.description: Method used by Mashgin device to determine the Item

last_item_update_date.description: Date and time the Item data was updated

store_name.description: Name of the Store (Revenue Center Name)
